4ccconv(1) General Commands Manual 4ccconv(1)

NAME

4ccconv — 4 Character Code Conversion Tool

SYNOPSIS

4ccconv [-xu4] number

DESCRIPTION

4ccconv automatically converts a 4 character code to its hexadecimal or unsigned int representation, and vice versa.

Optional Arguments:

-x
print hexadecimal representation of ‘number’ as a 4cc
-u
print unsigned integer representation of ‘number’ as a 4cc
-4
print 4 code char representation of ‘number’ (0x prefix will be interpreted as hexadecimal)
10/2/20 Darwin
